citeinfo.origin: MNDNR - Ecological Services and Fisheries Divisions
citeinfo.title: Lake Bathymetric Aquatic Vegetation

pubinfo.publish: MNDNR - Ecological Services and Fisheries Divisions

descript.abstract: Aquatic vegetation represented as polygon features, coded with vegetation type (emergent, submergent, etc.) and field survey date. Polygons were digitized from scanned, geo-referenced Lake Bathymetric Contour Map Images (map_lakeim2.tif).
descript.purpose: Spatial and temporal vegetation patterns, habitat availability, APR/APM permit monitoring.
descript.supplinf: Statewide, however GIS products have only been completed for selected lakes at this time.

timeperd.current: Product dates depend on field work dates related to production of original lake contour maps. See attributes to find survey date for individual polygons. Contact Information to obtain individual dates for related bathymetric GIS products.

theme.themekey: hydrography, lakes, bathymetry, aquatic vegetation, inlandWaters

idinfo.useconst: Internal DNR use is unrestricted. External use is constrained by the standard, general DNR GIS Data License Agreement.

dataqual.logic: All polygons are closed and lines intersect where intended. Polygons representing vegetation from different survey dates may overlap.
dataqual.complete: GIS products have been completed for a group of selected lakes. Work is proceeding on a lake-by-lake basis following priorities set by DNR Fisheries (funding source for this project).

horizpa.horizpar: Source layer bath_vegpy3: Not specifically assessed.

distbrep.distres: Source layer bath_vegpy3: Not specifically assessed.

overview.eaover:
Data Elements for Attribute Table BATH_VEGPY3.DBF:
ID: Polygon ID#
AREA: Surface area of vegetation polygon in square meters.
ACRES: Surface area of vegetation polygon in acres
PERFEET: Perimeter of vegetation polygon in feet
PERIMETER: Perimeter of vegetation polygon in meters
VEG_TYPE: Code for aquatic vegetation type
VEG_DATE: Field survey date for vegetation polygon (YYYYMMDD)
overview.eadetcit:
Value Domain for Data Element PERIMETER:
Value Domain for Data Element VEG_TYPE: EV = Emergent vegetation FL = Floating Leaf Vegetation Mixed = Mixed vegetation types SV = Submergent Vegetation
